title: Announcement: Upcoming US 12 City Tour
description:
I’m going to travel to 12 cities in the US, Canada and the UK in the next few months to speak about my book, 12 Rules for Life, and related issues. Tickets will be available for pre-sale February 20th at noon local time. Use DRJBP for pre-sale access: https://www.ticketmaster.com/Dr-Jordan-Peterson-tickets/artist/2467707. 

I’ll be starting in New York at the Beacon Theatre on March 25.
Toronto - May 3
Washington - May 4
Chicago - May 5
Detroit - May 6
Denver - May 8
San Francisco - May 9
Seattle - May 10 
London UK - May 13
Dallas - May 30
Austin - May 31
Phoenix - June 1

Tickets to the general public go on sale February 23rd at 10am local time. If you go to my website, jordanbpeterson.com, and subscribe to the mailing list at the bottom of the page, you can stay updated for future talks. 

Hope to see you there. Thanks for the continued support and interest. 


--- SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL ---

Direct Support: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/donate
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson

--- BOOKS ---

12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos: https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/
Maps of Meaning: The Architecture of Belief: https://jordanbpeterson.com/maps-of-meaning/

--- LINKS ---

Website: https://jordanbpeterson.com/
12 Rules for Life Tour: https://jordanbpeterson.com/events/
Blog: https://jordanbpeterson.com/blog/
Podcast: https://jordanbpeterson.com/podcast/
Reading List: https://jordanbpeterson.com/great-books/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jordanbpeterson
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jordan.b.peterson/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drjordanpeterson

--- PRODUCTS ---

Personality Course: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/personality
Self Authoring Suite: https://selfauthoring.com/
Understand Myself personality test: https://understandmyself.com/
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson

transcript_parts.text: Hi everyone
I'm gonna travel to 12 cities in the US, Canada and the UK in the next few months
To speak about my book, '12 Rules for Life' and other related issues
First I'll be in New York at the Beacon Theater at the end of March.
I'll announce the precise date in the next few days
I'll be going to the other 11 cities in May
I'll announce those dates very soon too.
Those cities include, Toronto
Washington, Chicago, Detroit
Denver
San Francisco, Seattle
London
Austin, Dallas and Phoenix
Tickets will be available for presale
February 21st if you go to my website JordanBPeterson.com and
Subscribe to the mailing list at the bottom of the page
You can register for presale notification. There's also an events page at JordanBPeterson.com
Tickets will go on sale for everyone on February 23rd.
Hope to see you at one of those venues
Thanks very much for the continued support and interest
bye-bye
